content.text: Hi, my name is participant_1. I build aquariums for a living. My brother in law runs a major hollywood studio. My wife is legally deaf. I have six brothers.
Hi, I'm participant_2. My husband just decided to leave me. We have 4 children and 2 dogs. I enjoy ice cream. I am 50 years old.
I'm sorry to hear about your husband leaving you. How are you doing?
I'm doing okay. It's a lot to take in, but I'm trying to stay positive.
That's good to hear. I know it's not easy, but you're strong and you'll get through this.
Thank you. I appreciate that.
So, what do you do for fun?
I love to go ice skating with my kids. We also love to go to the beach.
That sounds fun. I used to go ice skating a lot when I was younger.
Me too! I used to love it.
What else do you like to do?
I like to cook and bake. I also like to read and watch movies.
Those are all great hobbies. I love to cook and bake too.
Me too! It's so much fun to create delicious food.
I know, right? I love trying new recipes.
Me too! I'm always looking for new things to cook.
Well, it sounds like we have a lot in common. Maybe we can hang out sometime and do something fun together.
That would be great! I'd love to meet you in person.
Me too! I'm free this weekend if you want to go to the movies.
That sounds like fun! I'll see you then.
Great! I can't wait.
